title: Why, WHY do so many ADC players think they're entitled to flame everyone that's not doing well?
body:
These entitled little children annoy me SO much!

"GG bad supp"
"Afk mid"
"Jg never ganks"
"Top fed Irelia GG"

Why...why are so many of the arrogant morons playing this role. They never shut up or stop bragging. And when they lose they blame their entire team.


I'm not saying all ADC players are like this, but a LOT of them are.
